headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Lab Rats
content: In the arms trade, it’s not enough to be ruthless. You need every competitive edge you can get, and that’s where the men in white coats come in: employ some in your bunker with what they need, and they’ll get busy researching unique personal weapon modifications, a whole range of brutal tech for your Weaponized Vehicles, and terrifying upgrades for your Mobile Operations Center.
